# myicons <img src='man/figures/logo.png' align="right" height="138" />


<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
[![Project Status: WIP](https://www.repostatus.org/badges/latest/wip.svg)](http://www.repostatus.org/#wip)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `myicons` is to assist R shiny developers allowing them to 
manage their own personal, categorized icon library. 

Additionally, myicons helps automate rapid shiny-app prototyping via the use of 
the `random_icon` function which generates a random icon on the fly. 

## Installation

Install myicons from GitHub with:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("jimbrig/myicons")
```
